LanguageData.ConvertResourcesRaw.label: Create inorganic matter
LanguageData.ConvertResourcesRaw.description: Create inorganic matter by processing and converting various types of raw resources. Produces 150.
LanguageData.ConvertToSteel.label: Convert to iron ore
LanguageData.ConvertToSteel.description: Convert inorganic matter into iron ore. Produces 100.
LanguageData.ConvertToCopper.label: Convert to copper ore
LanguageData.ConvertToCopper.description: Convert inorganic matter into copper ore. Produces 100.
LanguageData.ConvertToAluminium.label: Convert to bauxite ore
LanguageData.ConvertToAluminium.description: Convert inorganic matter into bauxite ore. Produces 80.
LanguageData.ConvertToNickel.label: Convert to nickel ore
LanguageData.ConvertToNickel.description: Convert inorganic matter into nickel ore. Produces 20.
LanguageData.ConvertToUranium.label: Convert to uranium ore
LanguageData.ConvertToUranium.description: Convert inorganic matter into uranium ore. Produces 50.
LanguageData.ConvertToTitanium.label: Convert to ilmenite ore
LanguageData.ConvertToTitanium.description: Convert inorganic matter into ilmenite, the ore of titanium. Produces 20.
LanguageData.ConvertToWolframite.label: Convert to wolframite ore
LanguageData.ConvertToWolframite.description: Convert inorganic matter into wolframite, the ore of tungsten. Produces 10.
LanguageData.ConvertToSilver.label: Convert to silver ore
LanguageData.ConvertToSilver.description: Convert inorganic matter into silver ore. Produces 300.
LanguageData.ConvertToGold.label: Convert to gold ore
LanguageData.ConvertToGold.description: Convert inorganic matter into gold ore. Produces 20.
LanguageData.ConvertToPolymers.label: Convert to polymers
LanguageData.ConvertToPolymers.description: Convert inorganic matter into polymers. Produces 100.
LanguageData.ConvertToParaffins.label: Convert to paraffins
LanguageData.ConvertToParaffins.description: Convert inorganic matter into paraffins. Produces 100.
LanguageData.ConvertToSulphates.label: Convert to sulphates
LanguageData.ConvertToSulphates.description: Convert inorganic matter into sulphates. Produces 100.
